title: Understanding the Equivalence Point
text: At the equivalence point in a titration, the amount of acid equals the amount of base. Consider what happens to the products formed at this point.

title: Identify the Products
text: When NH3 reacts with HCl, it forms NH4+ and Cl-. Think about what happens to NH4+ in water.

title: Reaction of NH4+ in Water
text: NH4+ can react with water to form NH3 and H3O+. This reaction can affect the pH of the solution.

title: Write the Reaction Equation
text: Write the equation for the reaction of NH4+ with water.
